Name: Simon Ho
Bio: I have a deep passion for coding and software innovations. I have worked for Octasic for a year doing software development for Atmel microprocessors and a RESTful API server on a Beaglebone Black. Afterwards, I've worked as consultant at Onepoint and Alten, working on Linux application software for a braille display, aircraft simulation and QT user interface development for orthopedics medical assistance. Outside of work, I like to play video games, watch eSports and travel.
